nodes.text: Pampy was a female Rutian Twi'lek aide to Senator Orn Free Taa in the Galactic Senate during the waning years of the Republic Classic era.

Pampy, a Rutian Twi'lek, was working in 32 BBY alongside another Lethan Twi'lek as aides to Senator Orn Free Taa. Between the Invasion of Naboo and the outbreak of the Clone Wars, the Lethan aide was replaced by Supi. Both were present at a Loyalist meeting that determined the protection of Senator Padmé Amidala following an assassination attempt that delayed the vote on an army for the Republic.
